name: Common N5 Kanjis
description: Most frequently used N5 level kanjis (frequency rank 500 or better)

name: Popular Action Verbs
description: Common action/verb kanjis used in everyday Japanese

name: Essential Nature Words
description: Basic nature-related kanjis at N5 and N4 level

name: All N5 Kanjis
description: Complete set of JLPT N5 level kanjis (80 kanjis)

name: All N4 Kanjis
description: Complete set of JLPT N4 level kanjis (approx. 170 kanjis)

name: Common N3 Kanjis
description: Most frequently used N3 level kanjis

name: Common N2 Kanjis
description: Most frequently used N2 level kanjis

name: Top 100 Most Common
description: The 100 most frequently used kanjis in Japanese

name: Top 500 Most Common
description: The 500 most frequently used kanjis (covers ~75% of written Japanese)

name: Popular Range (101-500)
description: Kanjis with frequency ranking between 101 and 500

name: Moderate Range (501-1000)
description: Moderately common kanjis

name: Less Common (>1000)
description: Kanjis with lower frequency (advanced/specialized)

name: Time-Related Kanjis
description: Kanjis related to time, dates, and temporal concepts

name: People-Related Kanjis
description: Kanjis about people, relationships, and social roles

name: Numbers and Counting
description: Numeric kanjis and counting-related characters

name: Kanjis with コウ Reading
description: All kanjis with onyomi reading 'コウ' (kō)

name: Kanjis with ギョウ Reading
description: All kanjis with onyomi reading 'ギョウ' (gyō)

name: Kanjis with い-く Reading
description: Kanjis with kunyomi containing 'い' (i/iku/iru)

name: Contains 行 Component
description: Kanjis containing the 行 (gyō/iku) component/radical

name: N5 with Multiple Readings
description: N5 kanjis that have both onyomi and kunyomi readings

name: Common but Not in JLPT N5
description: Frequently used kanjis that aren't in the basic N5 list

name: Comprehensive Beginner Pack
description: All common N5/N4 kanjis with good frequency (excellent starter pack)

name: Han-Viet HÀNH/HẠNH
description: Kanjis with Han-Viet reading 'HÀNH' or 'HẠNH' (for Vietnamese learners)

name: Challenging N3 Kanjis
description: Less common N3 kanjis (good for advanced practice)
